input_dir.name: CSV Input Directory
input_dir.description: Folder watched for new CSV files. Default: /share/enersync/input

processed_dir.name: Processed Directory
processed_dir.description: Imported CSVs are moved here. Default: /share/enersync/processed

error_dir.name: Error Directory
error_dir.description: Failed CSVs are moved here. Default: /share/enersync/error

csv_glob.name: CSV Filename Pattern
csv_glob.description: Glob pattern of files to import, e.g. *.csv

csv_encoding.name: CSV Encoding
csv_encoding.description: File character encoding, e.g. utf-8 or latin1

csv_sep.name: Column Separator
csv_sep.description: Use a specific separator like ';' or ',' or set 'auto' to detect.

csv_dayfirst.name: European Date Format
csv_dayfirst.description: Enable if your CSV uses DD.MM.YYYY or similar format.

csv_datetime_col.name: Timestamp Column Name
csv_datetime_col.description: Override the column that contains timestamps. Leave empty to autodetect.

csv_value_col.name: Energy Value Column Name
csv_value_col.description: Override the column with energy values (kWh). Leave empty to autodetect.

csv_status_col.name: Status Column Name
csv_status_col.description: Optional column with quality/status flags (e.g., 'Wert ist gültig').

csv_valid_status_regex.name: Valid Status Regex
csv_valid_status_regex.description: Only rows matching this regular expression are imported. Leave empty to accept all.

dedup.name: Duplicate Handling
dedup.description: If multiple rows exist for the same interval, choose how to combine them.

anchor_kwh.name: Calibration Meter Reading (kWh)
anchor_kwh.description: Real meter value to align the cumulative sum.

anchor_datetime.name: Calibration Timestamp (Local)
anchor_datetime.description: Local timestamp of the real meter reading (DD.MM.YYYY [HH:MM]).

ha_base_url.name: Home Assistant Base URL
ha_base_url.description: Internal URL of your HA (default http://homeassistant:8123).

ha_token.name: Home Assistant Long-Lived Token
ha_token.description: Create it in Profile → Long-Lived Access Tokens, then paste here.

statistic_id.name: Statistic ID
statistic_id.description: The statistics entity to write cumulative energy into (e.g., sensor.stromverbrauch_salzburgAG).

name.name: Statistic Name
name.description: Human readable name shown in Recorder stats.

batch_size.name: Upload Batch Size
batch_size.description: How many rows to upload per request to HA (default 1000).

scan_interval_seconds.name: Scan Interval (seconds)
scan_interval_seconds.description: How often to check the input folder for new CSV files.

reset_watermark.name: Reset Import Watermark
reset_watermark.description: Set true once to re-import from the earliest timestamp, then set back to false.
